question_text:
Question 62 
[Transportation Engineering : Railway, Runway and Taxiway Design] 
 
The number of trains and their corresponding speeds for a curved Broad Gauge section with 437 m radius, 
are

 
20 trains travel at a speed of 40 km/hr 

 
15 trains travel at a speed of 50 km/hr 

 
12 trains travel at a speed of 60 km/hr 

 
8 trains travel at a speed of 70 km/hr 

 
3 trains travel at a speed of 80 km/hr 
 
If the gauge (center-to-center distance between the rail heads) is taken as 1750 mm, the required 
equilibrium cant (in mm) will be __________ (rounded off to nearest integer). 
Ans. 86 to 90
